import styles from './header-slidingBox.module.scss' import '../../../sours/icon/style.css' import { useState } from 'react' interface SlidingBoxProps { status?: 'default' | 'mobail', role?: string, info?: string | React.ReactNode } export default function SlidingBox({ status = 'default', role = 'unknown', info = 'fffff' }: SlidingBoxProps) { const [work, setWork] = useState(false) return
{ setWork(!work); console.log(work) }}>
{work}
{info}
}
